title: AVAPOW Car Jump Starter, 4000A Peak 27800mAh Battery Jump Starter (for All Gas or Up to 10L Diesel), Battery Booster Power Pack, 12V Auto Jump Box with LED Light, USB Quick Charge 3.0, 4000A peak current, includes 88Wh portable battery charger
descriptions:
**Product Listing for AVAPOW Car Jump Starter**

**Product Name:** AVAPOW Car Jump Starter

**Price:** [Insert Price]

**Product Highlights:**
- **Peak Current:** 4000A for powerful and reliable jump-starting
- **Battery Capacity:** 27800mAh/88Wh for extended use and multiple jump-starts
- **Engine Compatibility:** Suitable for all gasoline engines and diesel engines up to 10L
- **Usage:** Ideal for 12V cars, motorcycles, ATV, UTV, lawn mowers, and snowmobiles

**Key Features:**
- **Portable Design:** Compact and lightweight, making it easy to carry and store
- **Quick Charging:** Equipped with USB Quick Charge 3.0 and Type-C input/output for 75% faster charging than ordinary power banks
- **Charging Ports:** Includes two USB ports (5V/3A, 9V/2A, 12V/1.5A and 5V/2.4A) for versatile charging options
- **Start Times:** Capable of providing up to 40 jump starts on a full charge
- **Intelligent Protection Systems:** Features multiple safety systems including short circuit, low battery, high temperature, and reverse connection protection
- **LED Light Modes:** Embedded LED light with flashlight, SOS, and strobe modes for emergency situations
- **Rugged Design:** Built tough with metal clamps to withstand rugged use

**Package Contents:**
- AVAPOW Portable Battery Starter
- Heavy-Duty Jumper Cables
- USB-C Cable for fast charging
- Cigarette Lighter Converter for auxiliary power
- Durable Carry Case for convenient storage
- Comprehensive User Manual for easy operation

**After-Sales Support:**
- Benefit from our dedicated 24-hour online after-sales team ready to assist you

**Note:** Adapter not included with the product.

**Product Description:**
The AVAPOW Car Jump Starter is your ultimate roadside companion, delivering a whopping 4000A peak current and a high-capacity 27800mAh battery. It's designed to jump-start any gasoline engine and diesel engines up to 10 liters, ensuring you're never stranded with a dead battery. The device is 75% faster than traditional power banks, thanks to its USB Quick Charge 3.0 and Type-C charging capabilities.

Whether you're facing an emergency or in need of a portable power source while on the go, this jump starter has you covered with its multiple charging ports and intelligent protection systems. The LED light with various modes adds an extra layer of safety for nighttime emergencies.

All of these features are packed into a rugged, portable design that can be taken anywhere. The 40 jump starts on a single full charge make it a reliable tool for drivers of cars, motorcycles, ATVs, UTVs, lawn mowers, and snowmobiles.

Don't let a dead battery disrupt your journey. Get the AVAPOW Car Jump Starter today and drive with confidence!

**Buy Now!** [Insert Call to Action Button]

### **AVAPOW Car Jump Starter**

**Power Up Your Ride Instantly!**

Don't let a dead battery disrupt your journey! Introducing the AVAPOW Car Jump Starter, the robust and portable solution designed for all your emergency power needs. Whether you're driving a car, motorcycle, or larger vehicles like ATVs and snowmobiles, this jump starter has got you covered.

**Key Features:**

- **High Peak Current:** With an impressive 4000-amp peak current, this jump starter can breathe life into any gasoline engine and diesel engines up to 10L.
- **Massive Battery Capacity:** Equipped with a 27800 mAh battery providing 88Wh of power, it ensures up to 40 jump-starts on a single charge.
- **Multi-Purpose Charging Ports:** Features a USB Type-C port for in/out charging and two USB ports (5V/3A, 9V/2A, 12V/1.5A and 5V/2.4A) for all your devices, charging 75% faster than standard power banks.
- **Intelligent Safety:** Comes with an advanced protection system to prevent short circuits, low battery, high temperature, and reverse connections.
- **Versatile LED Light Modes:** Whether you need a flashlight, SOS signal, or strobe light, this jump starter is ready for any nighttime emergencies.
- **Rugged and Portable:** Not only is it designed to be taken anywhere, but it's also tough enough to handle the rigors of the road with its rugged design and metal clamps.

**What's Included?**

- AVAPOW Portable Battery Starter
- Heavy-Duty Jumper Cables
- USB-C Cable for convenient charging
- Cigarette Lighter Converter – for charging devices using your car's lighter socket
- Durable Carry Case – for easy storage and transport
- User Manual – to guide you through all the features and safety instructions

**Engine Compatibility:**

- Gasoline: All types
- Diesel: Up to 10L engines

**Ideal For:**

Cars, motorcycles, ATVs, UTVs, lawn mowers, snowmobiles, and more.

**After-Sales Support:**

We offer a 24-hour online after-sales team to help with any questions or issues you may encounter. (Note: Adapter not included)

**Order your AVAPOW Car Jump Starter today and stay prepared for any battery-related emergencies on the road!**

**AVAPOW Car Jump Starter - 4000 Peak Current, 27800mAh Power Beast**

Don't let a dead battery ruin your day! Introducing the AVAPOW Car Jump Starter, your reliable roadside companion that ensures you and your vehicle are never stranded. Whether you're driving a gasoline or diesel engine (up to 10L), this powerhouse has got you covered.

**Key Features:**

- **Powerful Performance:** With a peak current of 4000 amps and a battery capacity of 27800mAh (88Wh), jump-start your vehicle up to 40 times on a full charge.
- **Universal Compatibility:** Perfect for 12V cars, motorcycles, ATVs, UTVs, lawn mowers, and snowmobiles.
- **Intelligent Protection Systems:** Equipped with advanced safety technology to protect against short circuits, low battery, high temperatures, and reverse connections.
- **Rapid Charging Technology:** Features a USB Quick Charge 3.0 and a Type-C input/output for 75% faster charging than ordinary power banks. 
- **Multiple Charging Ports:** Comes with a dual USB setup (5V/3A, 9V/2A, 12V/1.5A and 5V/2.4A) to power up your devices on the go.
- **LED Light Modes:** Navigate the dark with built-in LED light modes including flashlight, SOS, and strobe.
- **Rugged and Portable Design:** Durable and compact enough to store in your car without taking up much space.
- **Comprehensive Accessory Pack:** Includes a Portable Battery Starter, Jumper Cables, USB-C Cable, Cigarette Lighter Converter, and a handy Carry Case.

**Additional Benefits:**

- **24-Hour Online After-Sales Team:** Peace of mind with round-the-clock support.
- **User-Friendly:** Easy to use with a detailed User Manual included in the package.
- **No Adapter Needed:** While an adapter isn't included, the versatility in charging options makes it unnecessary.

Whether you're dealing with an emergency or just preparing for the unexpected, the AVAPOW Car Jump Starter is a must-have for any vehicle. Say goodbye to the hassle of calling for roadside assistance and hello to immediate, reliable power. Get yours today and experience the ease of jump-starting your vehicle, charging your devices, and lighting up the night, all wrapped up in one rugged package.
